thread.title: Idaho nuclear lab director eyes new generation of scientists
thread.title_full: Idaho nuclear lab director eyes new generation of scientists

author: KEITH RIDLER
title: Idaho nuclear lab director eyes new generation of scientists
text:
Keith Ridler Idaho nuclear lab director eyes new generation of scientists 
FILE - This May 11, 2015, file photo, shows an exterior view of the Hot Fuel Examination Facility at the Idaho National Laboratory, near Idaho Falls, Idaho. Mark Peters, the new director of Idaho's federal nuclear facility says he sees plenty of opportunity to make it the nation's premier energy security lab while also bolstering the region's economy. (AP Photo/Keith Ridler, File ) HOGP Idaho nuclear lab director eyes new generation of scientists 
This undated photo provided by the Idaho National Laboratory shows Mark Peters, the new director of Idaho's federal nuclear facility. Peters says he sees plenty of opportunity to make it the nation's premier energy security lab while also bolstering the region's economy. Peters has been on the job for about a week at the Idaho National Laboratory, where he's in charge of about 3,900 workers. (Idaho National Laboratory via AP) Posted: Thursday, October 8, 2015 4:51 pm | Updated: 9:00 pm, Thu Oct 8, 2015. Idaho nuclear lab director eyes new generation of scientists   
BOISE, Idaho (AP) — Idaho's federal nuclear facility can become the nation's premier energy security lab while also bolstering the region's economy, the new director says. 
Mark Peters has been on the job for about a week at the Idaho National Laboratory, where he's in charge of about 3,900 workers. kAm%96 ?2E:@?VD 6?6C8J D64FC:EJ :?G@=G6D E96 &]$] 36:?8 23=6 E@ AC@5F46 :ED @H? 6?6C8J :? 2 DJDE6> AC@E64E65 7C@> 2EE24<D[ :?4=F5:?8 4J36C E9C62ED[ 96 D2:5]k^Am kAmQ%9:D =23@C2E@CJ 92D E96 23:=:EJ E@ C62==J D@=G6 AC@3=6>D 2E E92E ?6IFD[Q 96 D2:5 %9FCD52J :? 2 A9@?6 :?E6CG:6H H:E9 %96 pDD@4:2E65 !C6DD] Q%92EVD H92E xVG6 366? 565:42E:?8 >J 6?E:C6 42C66C E@ 2?5 E92EVD H92E C62==J 2EEC24ED >6] %9:D :D E96 36DE A=246 7@C |2C< !6E6CD E@ H@C< H:E9 2 E62> E@ 5@ E92E]Qk^Am kAm!6E6CD[ d`[ H@C<D 7@C q2EE6==6 t?6C8J p==:2?46[ E96 &]$] s6A2CE>6?E @7 t?6C8JVD C6D62C49 4@?EC24E@C 2E E96 gh_\DBF2C6\>:=6 7656C2= 724:=:EJ] %96 =23 :D @?6 @7 `f ?2E:@?2= s6A2CE>6?E @7 t?6C8J =23D[ H9:49 !6E6CD 42==D Q4C@H? ;6H6=D]Qk^Am kAmQ|2C<VD C64@8?:K65 =6256CD9:A :? 2== 7:6=5D @7 6?6C8J C6D62C49 — :?4=F5:?8 6?6C8J DE@C286[ C6?6H23=6 6?6C8J[ 6?6C8J 677:4:6?4J 2?5 ?F4=62C 6?6C8J — 2?5 ?2E:@?2= D64FC:EJ >2<6D 9:> 2? :562= 49@:46 2D E96 ?6IE {23 s:C64E@C @7 x}{[Q #@? %@H?D6?5[ r92:C @7 q2EE6==6 t?6C8J p==:2?46VD q@2C5 @7 |2?286CD[ D2:5 :? 2 DE2E6>6?E 2??@F?4:?8 E96 564:D:@? :? pF8FDE]k^Am kAm%96 x529@ =23 :D 4@?D:56C65 E96 ?2E:@?VD AC:>2CJ =23 7@C ?F4=62C C6D62C49[ H:E9 E9@D6 677@CED FD:?8 23@FE f_ A6C46?E @7 E96 =23VD 3F586E] p3@FE b_ A6C46?E @7 E96 =23VD 3F586E :D FD65 7@C 4=62? 6?6C8J C6D62C49 2?5 9@>6=2?5 D64FC:EJ]k^Am kAm!6E6CD D2:5 96VD @AE:>:DE:4 23@FE 4@>3:?:?8 <?@H=6586 2E E96 =23 :? ?6H H2JD E92E 4@F=5 3C:?8 :? 255:E:@?2= 7F?5:?8 QE@ 4C62E6 E9:D 8C62E 64@DJDE6> E@ >2<6 x529@ 2?5 E96 |@F?E2:?
